qas.question: As what can divergence in the groups be shown?
How does central Catalan behave with the groups?
What are the two dialectical groups of Catalan?
What language has a lexical unity?

context: Despite its relative lexical unity, the two dialectal blocks of <a3_0>Catalan<a3_0/> (<a2_0>Eastern and Western<a2_0/>) show some differences in word choices. Any lexical divergence within any of the two groups can be explained <a0_0>as an archaism<a0_0/>. Also, usually Central Catalan acts <a1_0>as an innovative element<a1_0/>.
